description: Superior weather protection for your backpack. The streamlined design is light and compact, and with 5 sizes there's one that will fit over your pack.Fabric is ultralight 40-denier polyester infused with silicone for waterproofness.Fully seam sealed and double stitched for durability.Dual point attachment system.Includes a compact stuff sack.Drainage port on bottom panel.Weights range from 68 to 142g.
name: Gregory Pro Rain Cover
